name: Bushido
overview: Video game made by Captain Spazer Fighting video game for two players. The objective is to concede 3 hits to the opposing player, the third hit features a finisher decapitating the enemy. There are two versions of the game. A solo with offset (very difficult to take hits) One with jump included which by pressing the up arrow you can launch an attack jumping on your opponent. Includes 3 selectable scenarios (by pressing the right key): -Cherry tree -Snowy -Tatami
